A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This quite simply ruined my Christmas. Rian Johnson destroyed all the good work from Abrams. The plot was weak\, the characters shallow\, and the sense of humor was infantile. When will directors realize that people want storylines and not over the top cgi. It seems like it was directorial ego trip and a worrying sign that Disney are now just gonna turn the franchise into another bland cash cow.
